title: On the Volume Density Spectrum of Fully Augmented Links
abstract:
For a hyperbolic fully augmented link in $S^3$, its \emph{FAL volume density}
is the ratio of its volume to the number of augmentations. We show that the set
of FAL volume densities is dense in $[2\voct, 10\vtet)$, but discrete in
$[\voct,2\voct)$.
